org.javers.core

Class JaversBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.javers.core.AbstractJaversBuilder
      • org.javers.core.JaversBuilder

  • public class JaversBuilder
extends AbstractJaversBuilder
    Creates JaVers instance based on your domain model metadata and custom configuration.
    Supports two configuring methods:
    • by properties file, see {TBA ...}
    • programmatically using builder style methods
    Author:
    bartosz walacik

      • registerValueTypeAdapter

        public JaversBuilder registerValueTypeAdapter(JsonTypeAdapter typeAdapter)
        Registers ValueType and its custom JSON adapter.

        Useful for not trivial ValueTypes when Gson's default representation isn't appropriate
        See Also:
        JsonTypeAdapter, JsonTypeAdapter.getValueTypes()

      • registerValueGsonTypeAdapter

        public JaversBuilder registerValueGsonTypeAdapter(Class valueType,
                                                  com.google.gson.TypeAdapter nativeAdapter)
        Registers ValueType and its custom native Gson adapter.

        Useful when you already have Gson TypeAdapters implemented.
        See Also:
        TypeAdapter

      • typeSafeValues

        public JaversBuilder typeSafeValues()
        Switch on when you need type safe Atomics serialization stored in polymorfic collections like List, List<Object>, Map<Object,Object>, etc.
        See Also:
        JsonConverterBuilder.typeSafeValues(boolean)

      • registerEntities

        public JaversBuilder registerEntities(Class<?>... entityClasses)
